name: wl-rgen2w
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wl-ral(s0, c0, wl-ral(s1, c1, w0))
-| wl-ral(s1, c1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wl-ral(s0, c0, wl-ral(s1, c1, w0))
-| wl-ral(s1, c1, w0)

|- wl-ral(s0, c0, wl-ral(s1, c1, w0))
-| w0

comment: Generalization rule for restricted quantification. Note that ` x ` and ` y ` needn't be distinct. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jun-2023.)
